method.name: spiStartIgnoreI
method.brief: Ignores data on the SPI bus.
method.details: This asynchronous function starts the transmission of a series of idle words on the SPI bus and ignores the received data.
method.pre: A slave must have been selected using @p spiSelectX().
method.post: At the end of the operation the callback is invoked, if enabled.
method.param: Number of frames to be ignored.

method.name: spiStartExchangeI

method.note: Buffers are organized as uint8_t arrays for frame sizes below or equal to 8 bits else uint16_t is used.
method.param: Number of frames to be exchanged.

method.name: __spi_isr_half_code
method.brief: Half buffer filled ISR code in circular mode.

details.verbatim: The callback is invoked with driver state set to @p HAL_DRV_STATE_ACTIVE.

method.note: This function is meant to be used in the low level drivers implementations only.

method.name: __spi_isr_full_code
